title: uploading big files fails (fastcgi, fcgidmaxrequestlen too small)
body:
even though this bug report involves both, oc client and core, it would be nice if the core could directly avoid this problem.

when upload big files (here 20mb) with the oc client its log reads:

    11-30 13:34:00:416 csync.propagator - remote repository atomar push enabled for ownclouds://owncloud.com/remote.php/webdav/owncloud/file20mb.zip (0).
    11-30 13:34:00:416 csync.owncloud - => open called for ownclouds://owncloud.com/remote.php/webdav/owncloud/file20mb.zip
    11-30 13:34:00:416 csync.owncloud - stating directory ownclouds://owncloud.com/remote.php/webdav/owncloud
    11-30 13:34:00:416 csync.owncloud - owncloud_stat ownclouds://owncloud.com/remote.php/webdav/owncloud called
    11-30 13:34:00:416 csync.owncloud - stat results fetched.
    11-30 13:34:00:603 csync.owncloud - simple propfind result code 207.
    11-30 13:34:00:603 csync.owncloud - server date from http header value: fri, 30 nov 2012 12:34:16 gmt
    11-30 13:34:00:603 csync.owncloud - ok: time delta remained (almost) the same: 16.
    11-30 13:34:00:603 csync.owncloud - working on file owncloud
    11-30 13:34:00:603 csync.owncloud -   :> subtracting 16 from modtime 1354182205
    11-30 13:34:00:603 csync.owncloud - stat result from propfind: owncloud, mtime: 1354182189
    11-30 13:34:00:603 csync.owncloud - directory of file to open exists.
    11-30 13:34:00:603 csync.owncloud - win32 tmp path: c:\users\ti5jo\appdata\local\temp\
    11-30 13:34:00:603 csync.owncloud - opening temp directory c:\users\ti5jo\appdata\local\temp\csync.rsmpp1: 4
    11-30 13:34:00:603 csync.owncloud - put request on /remote.php/webdav/owncloud/file20mb.zip!
    11-30 13:34:00:619 csync.owncloud - remaining mem buffer size to small, push to disk (current buf size 0)
    11-30 13:34:00:884 csync.owncloud - putting file through file cache.
    11-30 13:34:19:869 csync.owncloud - request failed, don't take session header.
    11-30 13:34:19:869 csync.owncloud - error - put status 500, internal server error
    11-30 13:34:19:869 csync.propagator - owncloud error: could not transfer file.
    11-30 13:34:19:869 csync.propagator - fail new: owncloud/file20mb.zip
    11-30 13:34:19:869 csync.api - propagation for local replica took 19.45 seconds visiting 624 files.
    11-30 13:34:19:869 csync run took  24850  milliseconds
    11-30 13:34:19:869 -> csync finished slot with error  true
    11-30 13:34:19:869   ** error strings:  ("datenaustausch mit owncloud fehlgeschlagen. die synchronisation wurde angehalten.")
    11-30 13:34:19:869     * owncloud csync thread finished with error
    11-30 13:34:19:869 oo folder slotsyncfinished: result:  4  local:  false
    11-30 13:34:19:869 ==> load folder icon  "owncloud-framed"

apache just returns a 500 and synchronization is aborted!


the problem is that i am using fastcgi with ``fcgidmaxrequestlen`` set to 15mb.
the apache error log reports:

    [fri nov 30 13:34:31 2012] [warn] [client  xx] mod_fcgid: http request length 16785408 (so far) exceeds maxrequestlen (16777216)



any ideas how to increase this limit automatically or at least inform admin about limit?

unfortunately, fcgidmaxrequestlen can only be set in server config and virtual host config [1] (not in .htaccess)

[1] http://httpd.apache.org/mod_fcgid/mod/mod_fcgid.html#fcgidmaxrequestlen
